feed.title: Metamapper Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Metamapper news and events.

entry.title: Introducing Metamapper
entry.summary:
Growing organizations rely heavily on data and analytics to drive decisions.

Luckily, it's never been easier to get data into your warehouse. The emergence of frameworks like Apache Airflow and Luigi make it easier than ever to write custom pipelines...
